item.title: About
item.description: Welcome to theATL.social About theATL.social provides ad-free user-supported social media services for the Metro Atlanta region. Support the operation of the server (and view monthly expenses) via our OpenCollective portal at opencollective.com/theatlsocial ❤️ Services Provided A Mastodon instance at theATL.social (Mastodon is a twitter-like service.) A Lemmy instance at yall.theatl.social (Lemmy is a reddit-like service) Questions about Mastodon, the Fediverse, ActivityPub, and all the other tech word things? Check out fedi.

item.title: Bots
item.description: News and RSS Bots Support the operation of the server (and view monthly expenses) via our OpenCollective portal at opencollective.com/theatlsocial ❤️ About “Bots” are accounts on theATL.social that automatically post news stories or timely information, based on updates to web pages or RSS feeds. Suggestions and feedback? Send a DM or mention @michael@theatl.social Update Frequency Bots are typically update every 30 minutes to 1 hour, daily. How to Follow a Bot Account Search for the account on theATL.
